feed.title: Immich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.130.3
entry.content:
v1.130.3

A few more bug fixes regarding usability.

Hotfixes

  • Fixes a bug where using the mouse on a touch device cannot open an asset.
  • Fixes a bug where the oauth login flow cannot complete
  • Fixes a bug where some albums don't show up on the mobile app
  • Fixes a bug of navigating between albums does not update the page view

What's Changed

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix: broken album page by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17149
  • fix(server): album count does not account for assets without exif by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17150
  • fix: bug with svelte gestures by @midzelis in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17154
  • fix(web): better touch device detection by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17144
  • fix(mobile): oauth-mobile-first-login by @shenlong-tanwen in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17173

üìö Documentation

  • docs: mention rknn among image options by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17156

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.130.2...v1.130.3

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.131.0
entry.content:
v1.131.0

Highlights

Welcome to release v1.131.0 of Immich. This release focuses on more bug fixes from previous performance enhancements, some new changes also managed to sneak in within the short time window that we have :grinning:. Please find some of the highlights below:

  • New map styles and POI with a globe view
  • Map performance improvements for high asset counts
  • View HEIC, RAW and other image formats in full resolution in the web app
  • Better support for NLLB search models
  • Fixes an issue where users with an external library cannot see all assets on the mobile app
  • Fixes an issue where some exclusion paths were ignored in the external library
  • Fixes an issue where photos randomly appear in album view or person view on the web

New map looks & performance inprovements

The map now comes with updated stylings, which include points of interest (POIs) such as parks, hospitals, schools‚Ä¶etc. On the web, you can now view the map as a globe view (sorry, flat-earthers!)

The map view is now much more performant for large asset counts, no more taking 10 seconds for the map view to respond!

To see the style and poi updates, you may need to clear your browser cache or wait 30 days

| Light | Dark | | - | - | | | |

| Globe view | | - | | |

View any image in full resolution in the web app

The Immich web app could previously only display an image in original resolution if the original could be displayed by the browser (JPEG, PNG, etc.). For formats like DNG that aren‚Äôt supported by major browsers, the web app could only show the preview image.

This release adds a setting to generate ‚Äúfull size‚Äù previews in addition to normal size previews. This means you can zoom into these images and view them in full resolution, even when the browser doesn‚Äôt support displaying the original. If the ‚ÄúDisplay original photos‚Äù preference is enabled, it will always display the full size preview if one exists for web incompatible formats.

Note that this setting doesn‚Äôt affect the mobile app, which already supports displaying the original for formats like HEIC (albeit not for most RAW formats). It also somewhat increases storage overhead and decreases image processing speed as it‚Äôs another (large) image to generate for each relevant asset. It‚Äôs an opt-in setting for these reasons.

To take advantage of this setting, go to the Image Settings and enable Full-size Image Settings, then queue all assets for Thumbnail Generation in the Jobs page.

Better multilingual searching with NLLB models

The NLLB model family performs the best for most languages excluding English, but Immich didn‚Äôt use them optimally. This release lets them perform at their best and brings a new tradeoff for searching: NLLB models give the best results for most languages, in exchange for the model interpreting a user‚Äôs searches as being in the user‚Äôs UI language.

If your users mainly search in a single non-English language, then these models are definitely worth a look. Each user can search in a different language since it‚Äôs based on the user‚Äôs UI language, applying to both the web app and mobile app (the latter must be updated to 1.131.0 or later for it to apply). If you‚Äôd like the flexibility for the same user to search in different languages, or if your users mainly search in English, then other models will work better for those usages.

See the documentation for more info on how to pick and change the search model.

Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app or purchase our merchandise at https://immich.store

What's Changed

üåü Enhancements

  • feat: use my.immich.app for externalDomain fallback by @bo0tzz in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17209
  • feat: improve performance for GET /api/album & /api/album/:id by @PathToLife in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17124
  • feat(server): consider JpgFromRaw2 tag for embedded previews by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17123
  • feat(web): increase album collapse click area by @PathToLife in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17213
  • feat(ml): better multilingual search with nllb models by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/13567
  • feat: original-sized previews for non-web-friendly images by @eligao in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14446

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(web): don't show newly uploaded asset in inapplicable views by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17184
  • fix(web): form reactivity by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17183
  • fix(mobile): prefer remote orientation by @shenlong-tanwen in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17177
  • fix(mobile): pause background video play by @YarosMallorca in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17032
  • fix: update renderlist after asset deleted by @Saschl in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/16786
  • fix: MAX_PARAMETERS_EXCEEDED error during person cleanup job by @hwang3419 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17222
  • fix(server): double extension when filename has uppercase extension by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17226
  • fix(server): multiple exclusion patterns by @etnoy in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17221
  • fix(server): don't sync null date assets by @etnoy in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17247
  • fix(server): Postgres error pretty printing by @bwees in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17204

üìö Documentation

  • docs: evaluate models on xtd-10 and flickr30k by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17159
  • docs: Update folder support for app in README.md by @Mraedis in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17191
  • docs: minor typo by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17258
  • docs: separate upgrading page by @bo0tzz in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17257

üåê Translations

  • chore(web): update translations by @weblate in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17115
  • chore: add language requests from weblate by @danieldietzler in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17236

New Contributors

  • @PathToLife made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17124
  • @hwang3419 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17222
  • @bwees made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17204

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.130.3...v1.131.0

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.131.3
entry.content:
v1.131.3

Hotfixes

  • Fixes an issue where the mobile app shows incorrect memories.
  • Fixes an issue where the web timeline doesn't load when there is a blank locale.
  • Fixes an issue where the full-size image doesn't migrate correctly.
  • Fixes an issue where the select-all button doesn't reflect the correct selection state.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix: strip extra metadata when transcoding by @bo0tzz in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17297
  • fix(mobile): getAllByRemoteId return all assets on empty arguments value by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17263
  • fix(web): date time change reactivity by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17306
  • fix(web): blank locale cause blank timeline to render by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17284
  • fix(web): select all button displays incorrectly by @wuzihao051119 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17305
  • fix(server): full-size images not migrated or deleted correctly by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17308
  • fix(server): use stat instead of exifinfo for file date metadata by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17311

New Contributors

  • @wuzihao051119 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/17305

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.131.2...v1.131.3
